Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.3 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 8.9 with a standard deviation 3.9. The z-score of the person with 10.3 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.76
* 0.36
* 0.53

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.76: Incorrect
* 0.36: Correct
* 0.53: Incorrect
